text: Salah Satu Vila Yang berada di seminyak bali dekat dengan circle K dan juga dekat ada beberapa cafe untuk harga di tawarkan cukup kompetitif dan sudah inculde breakfeast kolam renang yang cukup luas sekali,saran untuk pengelola lebih di perhatikan lagi dalam manajemenya terutama resepsionis kadang gak ada di tempat
title: Honeymoon

text:
Pengalaman luar biasa. Awalnya booking 3 malam 4 hari. Ternyata kurang. Akhirnya kami tambah tapi sayang hanya bisa 1 malam. Karena villa nya full. Kolam renang luas. Dapur dengan perlengkapan simpel. 2 lantai ( 1 kamar di atas 1 kamar dibawah) toilet luas dikedua kamar. Dilengkapi dengan bethub. Pelayanan sangat oke. Kami dapat free breakfast floating.
Yang perlu ditingkatkan (HARUS DIPERBAIKI) sarapan membosankana. 4x sarapan menu sama. Jadi yang hari terahir kami hanya request nasi putih (untung villa ini ada dapur dan lengkap dengan peralatan memasak)

Sangat rekomended utk kalian yg berlibur butuh ketenangan dan akses mudah. Apalagi kalian rombongan.
title: Liburan aman MEWAH tapi MURAH

text: sebelumnya saya tidak yakin pada saat mau membooking villa ini untuk teman saya untuk liburan bersama keluarganya.Karena kalau dilihat dari depan tidak ada tanda2 kalau villa ini asri dan mewah.Kemudian saya bertemu dengan receptionistnya. mereka sangat ramah,bersahabat dan siap membantu. kemudian saya utarakan maksud saya.salah satu dari receptionistnya menunjukkan kepada saya salah satu dari kamar di villa itu, dan apa yang terjadi?wowww....villanya sungguh asri,indah dan mewah,kolam renangnya berukuran kecil tapi lumayan buat berenang.ruang tamu dan dapurnya sungguh lega dan kesannya eksklusif.kemudian saya masuk ke kamar tidurnya dan juga kamar tidurnya luas dan mewah.kemudian saya telepon teman saya dan mengirim foto2 dari villa itu dan akhirnya teman saya setuju untuk membooking villa itu.mereka booking villa dengan 2 kamar tidur yang connecting...lega rasanya bisa membantu teman saya dan keluarganya untuk berlibur di bali.semoga nyepi tahun depan saya bisa stay di villa ini.

text:
Kami menikmati waktu di Vila. Propertinya dirawat dengan sangat baik, dengan banyak ruang pribadi bagi orang yang ingin menghabiskan waktu sendiri.

Kolam Vila adalah atraksi utama. Staf sangat sopan.

Meski demikian, menu sarapan dan kuantitas yang disajikan perlu dikaji ulang karena makanan yang disajikan per orang sangat terbatas. Juga tolong sediakan panggilan telepon untuk di luar Vila (tidak apa-apa jika Anda memberikan kami tarif ekstra!) 

Secara keseluruhan perjalanan yang sangat menyenangkan!
title: Pengalaman Vila Menakjubkan

text:
Saya dan teman menghabiskan malam tahun baru 2013 di sini. Vila yang sangat sangat sangat bagus dan bersih. Kami mendapat kolam pribadi, kamar mandi ganda, bak mandi cantik yang memanjakan Anda sepanjang malam, ruang tamu bagus untuk menikmati sarapan atau makan malam pribadi. Setiap kamar didesain untuk memuaskan tamu. Sangat nyaman. Jika Anda cukup malas untuk menarik tubuh Anda keluar vila, percayalah, Anda tidak akan bosan. Meski tidak ada pemandangan khusus dari kamar saya (Room I), tetapi kolam dan pohon kemboja sudah cukup untuk menghibur hari Anda. Menurut pendapat saya, vila ini cocok untuk Anda baik yang berpergian seorang diri, bersama keluarga, teman atau bahkan perjalanan bulan madu.

Staf sangat peduli terhadap kebutuhan tamu. Meski sarapan mulai pukul 7 pagi, tetapi mereka menyanggupi untuk memberikan sarapan lebih awal karena kami harus meninggalkan vila segera menuju pelabuhan Gili Trawangan.

Terima kasih banyak untuk mbak Nisa dari Bali Premier Management yang membawa kami ke vila ini dan membuat liburan kami lebih mudah dan nyaman, pengalaman yang sangat baik menginap di sini. Saya akan senang untuk kembali lagi dan merekomendasikannya pada teman-teman saya! Dan Bli Catur yang membantu kami dari The Jineng ke pantai Kuta untuk melihat parade kembang api.

Secara keseluruhan, The Jineng adalah vila yang sangat baik. Terletak di Seminyak, cukup dekat untuk menemukan keramaian. Butuh waktu sekitar 15 menit untuk berjalan ke pantai Double Six atau 10 menit dengan mobil atau motor ke Kuta. Serius, saya akan senang untuk kembali lagi! :)
title: Saya senang untuk kembali lagi!

text: Ini adalah tempat yang indah dan damai bagi siapa saja yang ingin bersantai, menenangkan dan memanjakan diri. Penjemputan di bandara, minuman segar pada saat lapor masuk dan staf yang sangat membantu memberikan awal yang mengagumkan untuk waktu menginap kami. Kolam yang cantik dan bersih, kamar yang indah disediakan untuk tinggal bersantai. Dua anak kami sangat menyukainya. Sebuah tumpangan menuju pantai menjadikan pagi yang luar biasa dan kemudian kembali ke vila untuk menyejukkan diri di kolam. Bantuan selalu tersedia. Sarapan luar biasa. Kekurangannya hanya tidak tersedianya layanan kamar untuk makanan lain. Harus memesan dari restoran sekitar tetapi staf memesankannya untuk kami. Pasti akan kembali lagi.
title: Sebuah tempat peristirahatan damai yang akan membuat Anda terbiasa!

text:
Sayang menginap tanggal 23-25 Oktober di Villa E. Secara keseluruhan lumayan. 

Pertama, desain villanya bagus dan modern tetapi kurang dan beberapa lampu tak bisa digunakan. mungkin, lampu-lampu itu hanya untuk dipajang. 

Yang kedua, kedua toilet sangat bau. Ini adalah pengalaman terburuk yang pernah saya alami. Bahkan lebih buruk dari hotel murahan. Tempat ini sangat parah. 

Ketiga, masalah nyamuk dan lipan sangat serius. Saya mulai membunuh nyamuk-nyamuknya ketika saya masuk villa hingga saya tak bisa menghitung berapa banyak yang sudah saya bunuh. Lipan-lupannya ada di sekeliling lantai di sebelah kolam renang. Saya merasa berenang dengan lipan di luar dan dalam kolam renang.

Keempat, karyawan hotel betul-betul harus mempersiapkan krim penolak nyamuk di villa untuk memastikan masalah mengenai nyamuk dikurangi. Staf hotel juga harus menyediakan alat makan dan gelas minum yang bersih setelah mereka mengambil gelas-gelas dan peralatan makan kotor dari villa kami. 

Kelima, persoalan sampah. Saya menemukan bahwa sampah-sampah masih di tempat semula pada saat kami melakukan check out tanggal 25. Sampah-sampah itu dibuang pada tanggal 23 malam, sedangkan kamar didatangai petugas pembersih kamar pada tanggal 24 sore. Saya jadi bertanya-tanya, apa yang dilakukan oleh petugas pembersih kamar, jika begitu? 

Keenam, sarapannya lumayan tapi tidak ada susu untuk teh dan kopi. Satu-satunya kotak tissue ada dii meja makan. Tidak di tempat tidur, dan yang terutama...tidak ada juga di kamar mandi.

Pintu kamar tidurnya TIDAK BISA DIKUNCI. Apakah menurutmu kami bisa tidur di malam hari? untuk 2 malam? Terima kasih untuk "keramahtamahan luar biasa" tetapi jangan lupa... SAYA MEMBAYAR UNTUK KERAMAH TAMAHAN YANG BAIK bukan untuk sesuatu seperti ini...
title: Di bawah harapan

text:
Saya mengharapkan saya membaca komentar terhadap Jineng sebelum memutuskan memilih villa ini dimana ini sudah saat terakhir saat pemesanan jadi kami tidak punya banyak waktu untuk memilih-milih dan kita diberikan penawaran yang sangat bagus-walaupun itu tidak berakhir dengan bagus. Kita tiba dan ditempatkan dalam Villa M saat malam tanggal 30 Sept 2012. Disana terdapat aroma yang sangat menusuk dari kamar mandi/toillet kamar master suite, jadi kami meminta untuk pindah ke villa lain yang sebelumnya kami diberitahukan boleh pindah pada hari berikutnya. Saat kami tiba dari Ubud saat siang hari kita menghitung uang yang kita letakan dibrankas dikamar. Sesuai janji kami pindah ke Villa B pada hari siangnya dan saat petang saat kami pergi mengambil uang kami dan kami menyadari uangnya hilang setengah-lebih dari 3 juta rupiah.

Saya segera menginformasikan staff resepsionis yang kelihatannya tidak cukup peduli, bahkan tidak meminta maaf mewakili pihak villa. Saya berkeras agar mereka melaporkan hal ini pada polisi dan mereka melakukannya dengan enggan tapi karena sudah lewat pukul 5 sore, saya harus menunggu untuk menyelesaikannya di hari berikutnya. Manajer dan asistennya mengantar saya ke kantor polisi di kuta keesokan paginya di mana saya diberikan sebuah surat laporan untuk perusahaan asuransi perjanalan saya oleh polisi, tapi tetap saja saya tidak menerima permintaan maaf dari pihak Jineng dan sejak saat itu, peristiwa ini sama sekali tidak disebut-sebut lagi. Kami mencoba agar hal ini tidak merusak saat liburan kami tapi hal ini benar-benar sangat mengesalkan saya.

Villa yang kami tempati sangat luas dan modern tapi wastafel kamar mandi di kamar tidur utamanya tidak berfungsi, tidak ada air dan toilet di lantai bawah berbau apak. Tidak ada teko di kamar dan lampu-lampu di lounge tidak dapat dinyalakan karena tidak ada soket untuk memasang mereka. Situsnya memasang bahwa ada kue-kue untuk malam hari dan penggantian seprai kamar -tidak demikian halnya yang terjadi. Mereka bahkan tidak menyediakan obat nyamuk seperti resort/hotel lainnya di pulau itu. Ada obat nyamuk elektrik yang tidak pernah diisi lagi, jadi saya harus pergi ke supermarket Bintang untuk membeli isi ulang dan semprotan serangga.

Sarapan paginya rata-rata, teh dingin dan kopi tanpa susu, roti paling murah dan jus dan pilihan yang sangat terbatas kecuali Anda siap untuk membayar ekstra. Staff di depan tidak terlatih dengan baik dalam hal pelayanan dan kemampuan mereka berbahasa Inggris tidak cukup baik bagi mereka untuk bekerja sebagai resepsionis hotel dan menangani permintaan-permintaan yang kadang-kadang cukup kompleks. Beberapa waktu ada 5-10 pemuda Indonesia bercengkerama di luar resort- tidak satupun dari mereka mengenakan seragam jadi mereka bukanlah staff. Saya merasa hal ini sangat mengganggu karena mereka selalu mengawasi setiap kali saya tiba atau meninggalkan kompleks sendirian.

Kemudian, tidak adanya petugas keamanan dan juga pintu samping yang melalui meja resepsionis selalu terbuka menandakan siapapun dapat keluar masuk tanpa diketahui. Kami diantar oleh staff hotel ke Seminyak 2 kali. Pada kali pertama kami dikenakan tarif 50.000 yang harus kami bayarkan secara tunai kepada supir (staff resepsionis), bayaran ini tidak dapat dimasukkan ke tagiham. Pada kali kedua supir kami memberi tahu kami bahwa layanan ini sebenarnya gratis! Pada hari terakhir kami, saya bertanya apakah kami boleh check out sedikit terlambat karena bayi kami masih tidur dan kami akan naik penerbangan malam pulang ke rumah. Saya diberi tahu bahwa hal ini tidak memungkinkan karena sudah ada keluarga lainnya yang akan check in pada pukul 2 siang dan mereka perlu membereskan villa.

Saya juga bertanya apakah mereka dapat mengantar kami ke kota setelah kami check out tapi mereka mengatakan bahwa tidak ada mobil tersedia. Saya segera membangunkan bayi kami dan pergi, sangat kecewa dengan seluruh pengalaman kami di sana. Mereka bahkan tidak menawarkan untuk membawakan tas-tas kami dari villa dan hanya menyaksikan kami bersusah payah mengangkut semuanya (dan bayi kami) sebelum akhirnya tiba 5 menit terlambat untuk bertanya apakah kami butuh bantuan. Pada saat itu saya dan suami saya memperhatikan bahwa ada sebuah mobil Jineng tidak terpakai, bertolak belakang dengan apa yang telah mereka beritahukan pada kami! Saya sangat senang meninggalkan tempat itu!

Beberapa jam kemudian kami tersadar kami telah meninggalkan selimut bayi kamar di lemari di kamar di lantau bawah. Jadi kami singgah di tengah jalan menuju bandara, dan terkejut mendapati bahwa bukan saja villa kami kosong melompong tapi para staffnya sedang menonton TV di kamar lantau bawah dan selimutnya sudah menghilang!!! Ini, untuk saya, membuat pengalaman kami menjadi benar-benar buruk! Satu-satunya hal yang bagus dari tempat ini adalah seorang gadis muda yang kadang-kadang bekerja di meja resepsionis saat para laki-laki itu tidak berada di sana, dia benar-benar udara segar. Seluruh suasana di tempat itu berubah selama ia ada di sana. Untuk siapa saja yang sedang membaca ulasan ini, saya akan benar-benar berpikir serius dua kali sebelum memutuskan untuk menginap di sini.

Anda akan mendapatkan villa lain dengan perlengkapan, lokasi, dan staff yang lebih baik dengan harga yang sama atau bahkan kurang. Orang-orang ini tidak dapat dipercaya!!! Sungguh menyakitkan untuk saya harus menuliskan ulasan yang sangat menusuk ini, tapi untuk hal ini ada banyak sekali hal-hal yang perlu dipaparkan kepada para pembaca tripadvisor.
title: Sangat mengecewakan !!!!

text:
A big thanks to Jineng Villas. We travelled as a family (2 teenage girls) and stayed in a  2 bedroom pool villa. They patiently waited to pick us up which ended up around 1am given the plane was delayed and the hour it took to get through immigration! 
The villa itself was just lovely and the girls loved the breakfast choices and had the High Tea everyday. Jineng is well located and just 400 metres off the busy shopping area. It is also just a 20 minute walk to Double Six beach where we ran several mornings.  It also has a Circle K shop just across the road for snacks and the fun Orchard Bar just 100 metres down the road. 
This is my second time to Jineng and I would recommend it
title: A lovely relaxing time

text:
The Villas are spacious with very friendly staff. Breakfast (from a set menu) is served in your room. You receive a complimentary high tea each day, however you have to confirm with the reception staff in the morning that you want the high tea that day.

The pool is beautiful and clean, however has a deep step into which requires you to take extra care when getting into the pool.

The Villas a clean and well maintained. I'm very particular about cleanliness, so I did notice areas where attention to details could be improved e.g finding hair in the dressing table chair, breakfast dishes not collected from villa to noon.

 The Villas are in a quiet street approximately 7 minute drive to the high street. If going to the high street, the staff will call a taxi for you (paid for by Jineng Villa) or they'll drop you off. 
A driver can take you on personalised tours of Bali, for a reasonable price.
title: Beautiful pool villas, 7 minutes from High Street

text:
Resident in Canberra Australia, over the years we have travelled fairly extensively.
During recent times North America, UK/Europe and SE Asia have been the main focus.
Due to their proximity to Australia, Thailand, Bali and Vietnam have become more regular destinations, each offering holidays more interesting and economical than staying within Australia.

For us 2019 is a busy year with three trips planned and this is the first.
Bali has been a fairly regular haunt (Trans Resort) but this time we went for a smaller private villa in the heart of Seminyak and stayed in January rather than later in the year. 

Flights were with QANTAS each way from Canberra via Sydney. One blackmark to QANTAS - I asked if we could leave Canberra on an earlier flight to make the stopover in Sydney more relaxing - 4 hours rather than less than 2.  The response was an additional charge of approx. $1000 would be applied!  No further conversation was had and instead we arrived early for our flight out of Canberra and we were offered the earlier flight with no discussions and no charges.  Being Platinum FF we had hoped for better recognition of loyalty and status than that initially proffered.  

Anyway it all turned out well and a fantastic long lunch in the First Class lounge followed....it is truly a first class facility and an experience for those that can indulge.

At Bali, our bags were amongst the first off the carousel so immigration was a breeze and soon we were in the hands of a cheery and efficient driver from the Jineng Villas.

Two things were notable on the short  drive to the Villa - how much cleaner the sidewalks and roads sides were (very little rubbish and many strategically located and well-used refuse bins in evidence) .and also how much quieter the roads and sidewalks were at this time of year = a great start.

All Jineng Staff were all helpful, organised and prepared for our evening arrival.

Minimal administration at check-in and we were quickly shown to our villa via a quite delightful enclosed walkway - enclosed with a bamboo archway.

First (and lasting) impressions were all positive - the cleanliness, plumbing, electrics and wi-fi all performed to expectation.  The rooms had been sprayed for mossies and we quickly settled in.

For two of us it is a great set up; a separate dining area with lounge and dining table facilities, with TV, refrigerator, sink and (should it be needed) a food preparation area.  Cold drinks were already provided free of charge in the refrigerator along with welcome drinks and cold towels.  The bottled water is replaced daily -   6 bottles.

Adjacent to this room is another large room which provides a huge bed with crisp linen, TV, cupboard, desk and usual amenities, plus wardrobe and a large bathroom with spa bath, sink, mirrors shower and toilet.  

Separating the two large rooms is an outside enclosed toilet and shower which are really useful when swimming in the pool.

Now to the pool.  For us it was a great facility - clean, lovely temperature and long enough to do some useful swimming laps.  The depth is even throughout at about 1.6m however there are no steps or ladder provided for more elegant entry and exit!
If there is a criticism this is it - it is potentially dangerous for the less able to manage pool entry and exit and great care (and a little strength) may be required.

Otherwise we found everything to be beyond reasonable criticism.

Functionally everything was provided and everything worked as desired.
All the paintwork and building structure had been refreshed and there was a nice feeling of someone caring and attending to the detail too often missing in such arrangements.

The breakfasts (and lunches and dinners) were served in the rooms from a quite comprehensive menu and all were enjoyed.

The transport arrangements were fantastic - anywhere in the Seminyak area free transport was provided - either the Villa private minibus or a cab was called and paid for by reception.

And so we rate this small complex very highly and would certainly be most happy to return.  

The original bookings were made via Luxury Escapes and judged to be excellent value for money and were exactly as advertised.  Well done and thank you Jineng.
title: 7 nights at Jineng Villas, Seminyak Bali

text:
In the character filled beautiful back streets near Bintang Supermarket, these are private and quiet villas. We were blessed by the company of birds daily. 
The villas do need some maintenance though. They are way overdue for a freshen up with some paint and plaster for the cracks. While we were there our air con, toilet and towel rack all failed. A night without air con in Bali is not something I recommend.They provided an air cooler but it wasn't strong enough. The staff were straight onto the issues when we told them. 
The food was generally nice but we got sick from one of the prawn meals. We shared some dishes and those who ate a little got a little sick, I had the majority of the dish and was down with Bali belly for 24 hours - very sick. We chose to eat nearly all our meals elsewhere after that even though meals were part of our deal. The Karma Cafe is across the road and The Orchard Bar and Restaurant is a few doors down.
There are so many villas in Seminyak if that's the way you want to go, Jineng is nice but there are probably better
title: Great staff and but villas are tired

text:
Stayed September 2017 in Villa E. This is the 4th villa we have stayed at in Bali.

Pros: Great room, large lounge/kitchenette, large fridge.A/C works well. Large bathroom and bedroom. 2nd bathroom consists of a toilet/shower/basin beside the pool.Great size pool. Staff very friendly, smiling, keen to help and assist. Villa has drivers able to take you to the Seminyak area. Villa was of a professional clean standard, and was debugged each evening, and mosquito coils left burning. Very few mosquitoes/bugs spotted in Sept.

Cons: Very little direct sunlight in September. Can lie in the sun in one area beside the pool for about 90-120 minutes in the morning. For the rest of the day, there is no sunlight for sunbathing, except in the pool.
Outdoor chairs do not lie flat, so if there was sun, unable to lie on stomach or side to tan. Would have much preferred a normal sun lounger.
Villa is a 10-12 minute walk from any real shopping, 20 minute walk to beach.
Villa is somewhat clinical, enclosed. Whilst it is well decorated with Balinese pieces, it lacks a Bali 'feel'.
Floors are VERY slippery when wet.
title: Great rooms, friendly helpful staff.

We stayed 5 nights.

text: We stayed 3 nights at The Jineng Villas, Seminyak. I would say staying with them is the most pleasant thing we experienced in Bali. The Staff are wonderful, well-trained and have service mind. The villa is very spacious with bedroom, bathroom , living room, pool, shower Room and restroom outside where you can shower after swimming. The pool is bigger than others comparing to a pool in villa which you can really swim. Location is not so far from business district of Seminyak, still walking distance. The villas also provides free transfer service to Seminyak area which very nice as walking out there is very hot , also it's high chance to be ripped off by taxi there..... even Blue Bird Taxi which they have meter ( we had really bad experience about this as taxi driver refused to use the meter and tried to charge us 350,000 for a short distance) 😡 They served us breakfast in villa everyday and i would say it's quite variety choices for you to chose. Besides from the bad experiences in Bali from local vendors, taxi and some people there, our decision to stay at The Jineng villas is the best one for this trip.

text: Wow what a great stay we are currently having. We are into day 3 of 7 at our one bedroom pool villa and we cannot fault this place. The staff are so happy and accommodating nothing is ever a problem. Their English is great and conversational. I'm writing this while listening to them sweeping the front path quietly singing local tunes. The food at Jineng is beautiful. Between us have tried most selections on their lunch menu and they are great. The steak is possibly the best we have had in Asia ! We travel once a month throughout Asia for work so I think we have good grounds for comparison ! The pool is cleaned daily and at night they provide a turn down service and spray for mosquitoes which is optional however as we are out this is ok for us. There are local warungs nearby plus spas. The complimentary shuttle car is available to Seminyak and if it is in use they simply organize a taxi and pay the fare for you. Something which we don't expect. The beds are very comfortable and linen is so crisp and air conditioning in both areas is fantastic. I would definitely stay again. This place is great value for money. Fantastic accommodation - we are in Villa J !
title: Sensational villa value for money

text:
We were really looking forward to staying at Jineng Villa's by Karaniya having just previously stayed at Seminyak Icon which is another Karaniya experience hotel a couple of weeks before. However, the difference between the two couldn't have been starker! Our one bedroom pool villa was nowhere near the standards of the equivalent one at Seminyak Icon and it cost us more for the same duration. We were naturally quite shocked by this as the vast majority of reviews for this place are pretty decent, but our stay was disappointing to say the least...maybe we got the short room straw as other guests have mentioned!

Our private pool had leaves and plants floating around in it on arrival and never looked inviting during our stay. The breakfast was poor, so much so that we left most it and never ordered another. There were no mosquito coils and the whole villa just looked tired! 

But the worst part was the constant flies, they were all over the shower/toilet area and made us feel dirty, like nothing was ever clean. Consequently we spent most of our time out of the villa apart from sleeping, as I was killing around 15 large flies on the tile walls every time I went in the bathroom area! As a result we cut our stay down from three days to two as we couldn't be out of there fast enough.

Personally, for us this place is overvalued and overrated in comparison to other villa's in Seminyak/Bali!
title: Poor and below expectations!

text:
My husband and I stayed here using a Scoopon voucher and enjoyed it a lot. Rooms were as they look in the pictures, pool was great and well maintained, as were the gardens, and service was impeccable. 

We had a fair few meals included in our voucher so took advantage of them, but while the food wasn't bad, it certainly wasn't great either, and we tried most of the menu to be sure.

Rooms were cleaned daily, with towels changed daily too, and the turn down service at night also included spraying for mozzies and lighting mozzie coils. Great if we were out at the time, not so great if we weren't because of all the chemicals we then inhaled. At least the staff are conscious of the mozzies though.

The staff were also most accommodating when our flights got changed and instead of the original plan of checking out on time for an afternoon flight, they were able to extend our checkout time by 2 hours then let us come back for a shower at 10pm before taking us to the airport for a 1am flight. I've never known a hotel to do this before and we were ever so grateful.

One major downside which is why I couldn't give it 5 stars: the bed. We stayed in villa K and the bed was hard as rock, as well as wonky with a big dip in the middle. Pillows seemed old and flat too and I just feel when you pay for accommodation, you're mostly paying to sleep somewhere so hopefully staff take note and put some new beds in because I don't think I'm the first one to make this comment. I can also usually sleep anywhere so it's a big deal for me to say this!

Other than that, a lovely stay! Very homely, welcoming vibe and we enjoyed our stay very much.
title: Close to perfect

text:
We stayed in a 1 bedroom pool Villa. There are 2 seperate living areas - the bedroom/bathroom and lounge/dining areas. Both were very spacious and well set out and the pool was in between both. It was lovely sitting by the pool with everything at your fingertips. There was even an outside shower/toilet so you didn't have to go inside all wet.
All meals were provided and delivered/served in our dining room - they would let you know when it was ready - it was great being spoilt.
The staff greeted you by name every time - it really made it feel like we were part of a large family. 
The butler service was great - they take you to anywhere in Seminyak and the taxi drive home was always really cheap (only a couple of dollars).
They have security staff out the front of reception 24 hours a day. They always greeted us and checked our car to make sure we got all our belongings. They even helped us with a dodgy taxi driver who was trying to rip us off - we cannot praise these guys enough!!
Reception is also open 24 hours - this was very handy so you could leave your keys there, you don't have to worry about losing them.
This place is amazing, I highly recommend it to anyone who wants to stay in Seminyak close to most things but not on your doorstep.
We could not hear the neighbours or any of the nightlife, it was lovely and peaceful.
Perfect!!!
title: An amazing Villa with staff to match

text:
We loved 99% of the Jineng villas, All staff are lovely and most welcoming. Bed comfortable. Was great they have a outside toilet and shower for your private pool. Also have a spa bath which had water in it when we arrived and air conditioner in the rooms when we arrived. But with using the pool we didn't get around to using the spa.  We had a special which included  breakfast, dinners and high tea which was all lovely and all bought to the villa. Massage girls where good but don't talk much English, we put a order in one day and they bought the massage tables earlier on and they didn't arrive then when we rang to ask they had to change the time as they weren't available then the boys took the massage table away and when they finally came they massaged us both on the bed, The next time was different girls and they had the table and where much better than the first two. 
The only thing wrong which will stop us going back there is the pool is hard to get into for the elderly.  The first step is very low down and then you have to fall the rest of the way into the pool.  I'm, 5ft 8 and I had to get on my hands and knees to enter the pool and had to push up on the ledge and rolled on the ground to get out.  We asked  2 different people for a ladder or something but they either didn't understand and said no.  The pool is lovely when you get in and good depth.  Great private and quite place to stay,  you only go down a alley way to get to the  bigger grocery shop, or other restaurant's and they have a little deli opposite for a few items.  Restaurant next door wasn't very good as the people don't talk English, hard to get items and when we asked for a cool drink either coke or maxi  they said they didn't have it then we saw someone else get it. after us so hubby wouldn't go back there again. Over all its lovely place if you are nimble enough to get in and out of the pool.
title: Great for middle age couples.

text: We had a 4 night stay in Jineng Villas and it was AMAZING! We have not one bad thing to say about this place. The villa itself was stunning, modern, and even bigger than it looks in the pictures. The pool was amazing, big and so great to have a private pool, it was very clean too. The staff were extremely friendly and helpful and were always available to help you out. The free shuttle offered was great for being taken anywhere in Seminyak so we didn't have to worry about taxis. The villa is located on a quiet street so it isn't noisy at all when you are in your villa and the big supermarket is only about an 8 minute walk away. The aircon was great in the bedroom and the living area. A delicious breakfast was included every day and you can pick from a large list of choices the day before. We also ordered cocktails and some small plates of food throughout the day on the room service and it was all very reasonably priced and was delivered quickly. Free wifi was great too! I couldn't recommend Jineng Villas more if you are staying in Seminyak! We actually spent 2 full days just chilling in the villa at our pool we enjoyed it that much. We will be back!

We recently arrived home after a 3 night stay at the Jineng Villas.

Our stay here was amazing, we have no complaints whatsoever.

The villa itself is spacious, clean, well equipped, very cool and the pool is a great size and very clean.

The staff were all very friendly and helpful, nothing was too much bother.

The free shuttle they have around the Seminyak area is great and saves the hassle of using taxis.

Breakfast is served in the villa each morning and you can select what and when you would like it.  The quality was great.

The villa is located in a quiet street so the villa is nice and peaceful, however it is only a 6 minute walk to Bintang supermarket and all of the shops and restaurants on Jalan Legian.

It was our wedding anniversary and the villa brought us a delicious cake and decorated the room with beautiful flowers and roses. This was a lovely touch.

We would 100% recommend others to stay here, we will definitely return.

Thank you for a lovely stay :)
title: Amazing stay!

text:
We stayed here for two nights and couldn't have been happier with the place. The villa itself is roomy with separate living and bedroom areas. The pool is way bigger than the regular plunge pools that a lot of private villas have, you can actually swim here.

Rooms were clean and well stocked, including mosquito repellent and travel adapters. You can rent DVDs if you like to either watch in bed or the living room ( we dind't get time for this). Breakfast has to be picked a day earlier and is then brought to your room at a time of your choice which is very convenient. Excellent breakfast too.

The staff here don't seem to know how to say no. Nothing we asked them was too much. They offer complimentary drop offs anywhere in Seminyak by friendly drivers 24 hours a day. They've even got a separate menu for after hours room service that includes food from neighbouring restaurants since their kitchens close by 22:00.

We had to be at the airport by 6am on our final day, and since we didn't have time for breakfast, they packed us a little snack box each with sandwiches and fruits which was very nice.

All in all we loved the villa and would recommend it to anyone. Thank you Teja and all the other staff (can't remember the names sorry!). You guys were awesome.
title: Beautiful Villas, Excellent staff

text: Airport transfer to the hotel was included in an air conditioned mini van .From the moment we arrived we experienced friendly, courteous service. We were greeted and offered refreshing welcome drinks before being shown to our Villa. The 2 rooms were spacious with king size beds and the on suite had already had a bath prepared to refresh after our flight. Our daily breakfast of choice was served in our kitchen / lounge room. The privacy and serenity offered in the villa made it seem as if we were the only ones there. They offer a shuttle service from the Hotel to any where in Seminyak for free at any time and all we did was arrange a taxi to return. When the taxi arrived the security staff checked it to make sure nothing had been left behind and recorded the taxi details just in case it would be required later. All of our requests to staff were handled with efficiency and friendly smiles and nothing was too much trouble. Enough bottled water was always on hand to satisfy our needs. They also arranged a dinner booking for us at a restaurant at short notice which is usually hard to get into. The rooms were always prepared perfectly. The location means that you are away from the busy area of Kuta but only a $5 aus taxi fare to get back. There is a nice Pub and shops within walking distance.

text:
We spent 5 nights at the Jineng Villas as part of a scoopon deal. We arrived late in the night and our transport was waiting to escort us to the villa. Check in was super easy and quick. They had also emailed me a few days before to confirm I was coming. They had written out and explained all the benefits that we received. 
The villa was amazing, huge king bed, separate lounge room, big private pool and full kitchen. Perfect place to stay if you want your own space. 
We received two massages and we booked these with reception. The ladies arrived to our villa with the equipment and we had an hour massage in the comfort of our own room. What more can you ask for?
Breakfast was brought to us every morning and we could choose what we wanted and what time it should arrive. Always hot and fresh.
We also received a daily meal that we could choose - available between 10am-10pm. Great food and always hot when it arrived. Hi tea was also offered every afternoon from 2-5pm and they brought that to your room. Always setting it up on the dining table and laying out cutlery etc.
Rooms were very clean and comfortable. The staff also provided a free shuttle to basically anywhere in the Seminyak area, which was great. 
Great little spa place right next door that you can have some massages, good prices too. The orchard is a restaurant/pub that is very close by. Does happy hour mango daiquiris :) yes!
About a 10-15 minute walk to the beach which was fine. Beaches were pretty dirty due to the weather and rubbish being washed up. 
The staff were always friendly and respectful, always calling or knocking before they entered or brought food etc.
Had a fantastic time here and loved it. Would definitely return. Thank you!
title: Fantastic Quiet Luxury Villa

text:
From the moment we were picked up from the airport to the time we were dropped of this was a wonderful experience. We arrived tired after an 8 hour delay courtesy of Jetstar and were met promptly and given water and refreshing towels immediately. On arrival we were given a glass of juice and from there on we were looked after so very well. The staff were friendly, professional and helpful at all times. The shuttle service to anywhere in Seminyak was great. The villas are lovely, clean and spacious and the standard of cleaning was excellent. I had heard that mosquitoes might be a problem but not at all - they spray the rooms and light a coil each evening and I was not bitten once! And believe me mozzies love me! 
My daughter and I had the most wonderful relaxing holiday and will definitely return. If I can find one tiny criticism it is that our scoopon voucher said you could include lunch or dinner each day but if you wanted lunch it had to be from the dinner menu not the lunch one and we never felt like a main meal in the middle of the day. We do feel that if lunch is included it should be from the lunch menu. 
The food though was nicely presented, delivered promptly and was always tasty. Well done Jineng Villas!

text:
Stayed a few nights in a one bedroom villa. One bedroom, but it came with a large adjoining glassed-in bathroom with spa bath and shower, and a dining, kitchen and lounge room next to the private swimming pool. A second shower and toilet was located between the main rooms, accessed from the pool deck. A high wall and tall vegetation ensured privacy and quiet within.

Everything was laid on - breakfast, another meal of choice per day, a daily high tea and several complimentary one hour massages - all at a time of your choice. A butler ensured every housekeeping need was met and a driver was always on hand to take you anywhere local in air-conditioned comfort, including airport transfers.

There is a free and relatively fast WiFi connection, cable TV in the lounge and bedroom and adequate kitchen facilities although there's almost no reason to use the them apart from the toaster and kettle. The refrigerator is always kept well stocked with complimentary bottled water. Both the main rooms of the villa were air-conditioned using split A/C units.

While Jineng Villas is a bit hidden away in a narrow back street, running parallel a main Seminyak shopping street, some even narrower laneways do offer 5 minute walk shortcuts between the shops and the Villas. This means the large Bintang Supermarket is little over a 5 minute walk away. Also a very quirky Irish Pub, called The Orchard, is only 100m down the road from the Villas. It has good meals, a selection of cold drinks and cocktails and live music at least once a week. It also has a resident chicken called Orchie who wanders about clucking away to herself.

Every one of Jineng Villas' staff were very courteous and friendly - butlers, maids, drivers, porters, front desk, gardeners and cleaning staff. Nothing was too much to ask for - although finding something to ask for would be difficult unless maybe you forgot your bedroom safe password, ahem.

Keeping everything clean and tidy in a tropical environment isn't easy, but bathrooms were mould-free and the pool clean. If I was forced to find a fault it'd be no handrail to hold to get into or out of the pool.

We will certainly be organising a return visit with friends since the 2 bedroom villas appear equally attractive.
title: A quiet and very delightful private oasis

text: We just spent 3 nights at this beautiful Villa in Seminyak. We loved it here. Very large private Villa with a huge plunge pool. The staff were all fantastic and could not do enough to make us comfortable. They serve you an amazing breakfast right to your Villa every Morning. I could get used to that! The food was great. Only a 10 minute walk to the heart of town . A good spa next door and a fun Pub called Orchard very close . We has an in Villa massage all included in the price. We were only a 5 minute drive to Double 6 Beach that is a very fun area. They would shuttle us anywhere in Seminyak for no charge. We were very happy with everything at Jineng except the lounge chair at the Villa. Not comfortable at all. Very minor in the big picture. We would go back in a heart beat. Thanks Jineng! You guys were great.

text:
The Jineng Villas and the service was FANTASTIC!!!

Breakfast (served in your villa) was abundant and yummy, with plenty of options. The area where the villas are locates is not too far away from Seminyak Rd, the beach and Seminyak Square but... the area around the villas is not so nice, but then again the majority of Seminyak is like this, where villa accommodation reigns supreme, with only a hand full of resort type of accommodation options available. 

The villa (for 4 people) was clean, comfortable and "modern"  with plenty of room. The villa itself is divided into an upstairs and downstairs rooms each with en-suite. Both rooms overlook the pool area which once again is well appointed. 

Next to the pool area is an open plan living/dining area. Roomy and comfortable. 

The staff were excellent. Extremely friendly (like most Balinese) and very accommodating. 

As mentioned the area surrounding the villas is OK, with a 24hr convenience store across the road, a taxi rank within 50mins and an Pub with good food and live music a few nights a week. 

If you have a young family walking into town might be a little too far but, the friendly staff will drop you off anywhere in the Seminyak area free of charge. You will have to get a taxi back. Make sure you get a taxi driver that is willing to turn on the meter otherwise, don't pay more than $20,000 (AUD $2 approx) for the ride. 

I'm sure you will enjoy your stay as much as we did.
title: Diamond in the Rough!!!!

text: We stayed here for 5 nights on our honeymoon. Our private villa and pool were amazing. text:
Our stay was wonderful.  Very quiet, relaxing but minutes away from all the hustle and bustle of Eat Street.  Free transport to all nearby locations was excellent.  The staff are almost the best feature here - just excellent in every way, nothing was any trouble and our mornings punctuated by "Buggy!" and big smiles was a wonderful way to start the day. 

The bamboo canopied walkway is so pretty and makes the place feel extra special.  Rooms are spacious and well set up and we loved the separate spaces and so much living area.  Only downsides: bed a bit too firm and they need adjustable sunbeds with cushioning, the wicker is hard and the angle is a bit much for neck comfort.

Will definitely be back.

text: We arrived to a beautiful room with special touches to make our Wedding Anniversary memorable! The meals were plentiful and delicious delivered to your villa, if you did want to venture out there are several places in close proximity that served cold drinks and good food. The Italian corner and the Orchard hotel both Good! The road in front of the premises is under construction however there was no construction noises that disturbed us. Very private and peaceful !  Having our own pool was wonderful.

text:
We are a new family traveling with a 5 month old.  The villa was amazing.  A cot and highchair were provided to us free of charge.  I read the reviews for this villa and decided to purchase a scoopon voucher,  I was a little nervous but the photos and other reviews are all 100% accurate.  The villa is beautiful and the private pool and separate lounge are perfect for those wanting to relax and indulge in quality 'me' time.  The staff are all very helpful and speak good english.  One morning we were going to go on an all day tour and were unable to have our included breakfast but they offered to pack us a breakfast sandwich to take with us!! The in-room massage were amazing and it was perfect being able to indulge in the relaxing massage while our daughter slept in the room next door without needing to worry about her. Each day the staff deliver your food to your room and they also spray for mosquitoes to ensure a pleasant stay.  We had very little annoyance from the mosquitoes.

The food provided by the hotel was exceptional! It was all high quality, presented nicely and we didn't get sick at all. No Bali Belly for us :) 

I can't recommend this place any higher - it was a perfect get away for us
title: Perfect choice for an amazing holiday!

text:
Stayed for 4nights with my husband for short holiday.
It took 3days for us to decide which villa should we stay. After saw the reviews of several villas we finally decided to stay at The Jineng since it seem worth the price with free BBQ or Massage and we saw many good comments about it.
And it was like what we expect. The place are so clean, swimming pool is big enough for 2, living room and kitchen with Air cond, and staff also friendly. I like the atmosphere.
When I get my free BBQ there was a plenty of food that we can't finish it. super worth it.

But why I didn't put 5 star for the review? 
They did not serve welcome drink upon check in as they mention on my booking that we will get welcome drink.
Unfortunately in my Villa where I stay, the bed was too old. I can't sleep well. Very lack quality of sleep. Woke up in the morning with my back ache.
The breakfast quite good even its boring for 4nights. The only bad thing about the breakfast was only nasi goreng. Taste was awful. Mie goreng was much much better.

But it was a nice stay overall.
title: What you see is what you get

text:
My partner and I stayed here as part of a scoopon voucher purchased only recently.
We had no problems arranging the dates we wished to stay and no problems with obtaining everything the package entitled us for..
Upon arrival we were given a very warm welcome and this continued throughout our stay..
Breakfasts arrived spot on time, lunches/ dinners etc were no exception if we arranged these either.
Staff were considerate, friendly and very well mannered.
The villa was maintained to a high standard and thoroughly cleaned everyday.
Nothing was a bother to organise and the transfers into town were never an issue- if the van wasn't available a taxi would be arranged and paid for by the hotel. 
There is also a lovely Italian pizza shop about 100 meters around the corner which I would recommend a visit to called - the Italian corner..
I really cannot fault our stay here at jineng villas, it certainly delivered on every level and we had a wonderful stay.. I would happily return here in the future and highly recommend it for the price and packages..
Thanks again..
title: Faultless stay

text:
We stayed for 5 nights in a 1 bedroom villa. Overall our stay was lovely and the staff are so friendly and helpful!

Pros:
The staff - they are all brilliant!
The villa - lots of space, excellent air con, 2 toilets and 2 showers. 
The free shuttle into Seminyak wherever you want
Close to Bintang Supermarket
The pool (in the sun from 10.30-2 each day)

Cons:
Breakfast- was always lukewarm on arrival. The menu looks good but unfortunately the food and drink was average. The juices were thick and flavourless. The best options were the banana pancakes and nasi goreng (although it was lukewarm and the satays cold)
The location - need to get shuttle/taxi to all the main restaurants and shops. Walking takes about 45 mins to Seminyak square but because of the heat it's hard to do.
Mosquitos in the villa. They spray the villa every night but unfortunately there were still mosquitos
The massages - very average however I think we didn't have their usual stuff

text:
We stayed at Jineng villa for 2 nights in May as part of our honeymoon in Bali. I have mixed reviews about the hotel to be honest. 

On the outside, the hotel is beautiful, the path to the villas are really amazing as well.  However, the welcome was not the best and a few other things that I will describe below

-	Hotel is located in the smaller streets along sunset road, about 10-15 minutes from Seminyak by car. 
-	The welcome from the porter was not very nice. He just looks angry and disgruntled to receive guests. 
-	The welcome drink was generous and refreshing. Check in area is pretty small. It can only host a couple at one time comfortably. 
-	There was also a buggy ride after we checked in to our suites. We initially thought it will take a while to reach our suites, but it was just a 10 second drive, which surprised us. haha..
-	Upon entering the villa, we took off our slippers and entered the area just outside the room, where the tanning beds were. The floor was oily to my dismay. 
-	When we entered the bedroom area, the floor was also oily, and yes, this was the same for the bathing area. 
-	There was a nicely stocked minibar with soft drinks, and drinking water. Soft drinks only complimentary for the first round while bottled mineral water is replenished daily. 
-	The curtains were slightly dirty, especially at the end, where it was touching the floor. 
-	There was also a musky smell in the wardrobe. There was a weird taste in the bathing water, which we did not experience when we were in another resort in Ubud. 
-	The kettle in the room was also dirty. The new kettle we requested was also dirty. 
-	There was oil smell (left from massages) on the bedsheets. 
CLEANLINESS IS NOT THEIR FORTE in my opinion and their housekeeping needs to buck up. 

PROS
-	They provide complimentary 2 way transfers to and from the airport
-	They provide one way transfer to any destination within kuta, seminyak and legian if I am not wrong of your choice. That really helped us in saving money on travel. 
-	The pool in the villa is clean 
-	The bathtub has Jacuzzi facilities
-	The villas are private and it’s like your home away from home
-	The breakfast is selected the day before and sent to your room. The spread is decent. 
-	There is a convenient shop just across the road that you can buy snacks from. 
-	The room was available before our check in time
title: Nice villa, but needs better housekeeping

text:
My husband and I stayed with our lil baby daughter for 7 nights. 
The villa & Getting around
It's an amazing villa, nestled away from the hustle and bustle on the Seminyak area. But not too far as you can make use of the shuttle service to be dropped off to anywhere in Seminyak and just take a cab back to the villa. The private pool is just awesome. 

Complementaries:
We had a complimentary Balinese massage which was incredible. Our little girl celebrated her first birthday while we were there and the staff made it so memorable with amazing poolside decorations and a lil cake for the lil bub.
Food:
We ordered breakfast previous night and it was ready the time we asked for next morning. As we were vegetarians, our request was accommodated when we asked something off the menu. 

Medical.
Our baby had a high temperature the first night we arrived but we were provided immediate medical attention the moment we asked. A doctor and a nurse came by for a consultation and prescribed antibiotics. We were asked to do a dengue test but refused as she soon got better. 

Staff:

The staff are awesome, we even made some friends along the way. Each one of them is very helpful and cheerful. We have made some great memories with all of you.

Advice to management:
Your staff are awesome, please retain them. :)
Sometimes the wifi was slow but I guess that needs to be looked at by management.

We will definitely come back if we visit Bali again. :)
title: Fantastic stay, brilliant staff, wonderful experience!

text:
Visited this property between the 10th and 14th of March 2016. At the onset had read some wonderful reviews abt this property which helped me make my mind to book this property. 
Reached Bali and the free shuttle service was prompt and there to pick me and my 3 friends at the airport. Great start to our Holiday. Friendly driver. The staff is also very cheerful and helpful. Had booked a 2 bedroom villa with a private pool and the property is true to the pics one sees on the website. It's very neat and since it's a relatively new property or newly painted, it's very soothing to the eyes. Fairly Big sized rooms and a nice toilet bath which is kept very clean by the housekeeping staff. The pool too is nice and apt. Not to huge and not the size of a jacuzzi also. 
The breakfast every morning needs to be selected from a choice of options and is delivered to the Villa and the service is prompt. For local transport there is a free shuttle service to nearby beach and market or one can hire a motorbike for approximately 60000 Indonesian ruppiah.
The beach is a 5 minute bike ride. The nearest beach is Double six beach and the Seminyak market is halfway to the beach. Even the happening Legian Street n Kuta are abt 15/20 mins away on the bike. 
All in all the stay was very relaxed and the property is a very cosy one. Would recommend it for couples and people looking at a relaxed holiday. 
We stayed in Villa no 2 or Villa B and since it's close to the reception and yet away it was very convenient. 
Would love to be back. Though the weather in Bali is very hot and humid and I say this even though I come from India. So pack mostly the short stuff to wear. Happy holidays :)
Cheers. Singha the local beer is yummy. Try the Lime n Raspberry flavours too.
title: Leisure Holiday

text:
We had booked the Jineng for 2 nights of our honeymoon after comparing reviews of many similar resorts. And I have to say that the choice was right as we had a great experience.

After the initial booking, I had to postpone the travel by 2 weeks as i came down with chicken pox and the Villa was very responsive and understanding in moving my booking at no extra cost.

The villa entry itself is very welcoming abd well maintained. When we arrived, we found the Villa to be exactly as advertised. The pool was well maintained and so was the bedroom and restrooms. The service was brilliant and the Villa staff were very friendly and smiling. Breakfast was good and the portions were heavy. The Villa staff even arranged a surprise b'day cake for my wife and wished her by singing a b'day song. 

Hardly anything to complain about, but a couple of suggestions. We found the bedroom air-conditioning to be a bit slow to our liking and maybe this could be something of a personal preference, but a faster cooling system would be great in Bali's humid conditions. Another suggestion would be to add handhelds to the jacuzzis.

Would recommend Jineng to whoever looking for luxury stay at reasonable cost.

Regards,
Sai Sankar and Uttara

Bali was crowded due to the new year festivities as well as its peak tourism period, but the atmosphere was excellent. we reached the hotel in about 30-40 min, given the traffic outside the hotel. Hotel entrance/front might seem abit small and may raise a couple of doubts about your booking, but that's all a facade, reception is small but moving to your private villa really is something, there are numerous villas down a bamboo sort of canopy walk way leading to your villa entrance. Opening the two doors to your villa is nothing but impressive large pool, private sectioned lounge/kitchen and private section massive bedroom with dressing station, desk. Th bathroom was large, amazing tub and rain showers. Plenty complimentary cool drinks (6 Cans for our stay) as well as 6 bottles of water each day was provided. Pool also has 2 loungers and its pretty relaxing on a hot day by the pool. Breakfast is done through ordering from a menu the night before with it being served at a time chosen in your villa. reception will give you a call in the morning at the time breakfast is requested to open your villa door.for delivery. Breakfast was great. The hotel also offers complimentary shuttle to semiyak main road so you can easily get around from there. Excellent service was also received from the cleaning staff. A couple of cleaners some to tidy your villa including a pool boy, garden boy. Great service as well as provided mosquito coils. There are a lot of mosquito in Bali so if you would be wise to bring some sort of body applied mosquito repellent for use in the day or even at your villa. Your also way better of renting a scooter as the cabs are a huge rip off. Scooter/bike rental via the hotel is recommended. Given the peak seam we stayed between Dec 30th and Jan 3rd, villa prices are on the very high side.
title: One of the best Private Villa stays!!!

text: My husband and I stayed here for a week in October. We were greeted at the airport and transported back to our villa. On check in we received a yummy welcome drink before being escorted to our villa. We stayed in villa F. The villa is awesome. Huge kingsize bed. The bathroom had a huge spa bath and the shower had a rain style shower head. It was extremely quiet which we loved. We heard no noise at all ever! It was very very clean and was cleaned daily. The breakfast was plentiful and always on time. Heaps to choose from and always hot fresh and delicious! They give you free wifi which is great but if you aren't using it it logs you out. So you have to keep logging in all the time. The location is a little out of the way. We like walking so this didn't bother us. We also hired a motorbike for the week to get around. There is a courtesy bus the resort will take you anywhere in Seminyak. We used this a couple of times at night so we could both drink! The staff are all amazing and so friendly. There is only two things I can fault. We put our dirty laundry in the basket provided but never asked for it to be cleaned by the resort. Their prices are astronomical compared to on the street! The basket was emptied twice and cleaned at a cost of over $30 AUD. As we never filled in the provided request and signed this to be done we were a little annoyed. The only other thing was when we booked we advised them we needed a very late check out as we weren't flying out until 11pm at night. Although I was told at the time of booking they may not be able to accommodate us we weren't told until the day before we were leaving that they couldn't give us a late checkout. So we had 11 hrs without a room. If they had emailed me before we were arriving I would have booked another night. They did lock our luggage up and let us use another villa to shower before we left for the airport. Besides that only have very positive things to say and we would definitely stay there again!
title: Quiet location and friendly staff

text:
It's very difficult and sounds almost unreal to rate a place that is absolutely perfect, but that is the case for the Jineng Villas, it is simply perfect. From the moment of arrival with their driver waiting at the airport to the moment we were taken back to the airport everything was fantastic. The villas are exactly as depicted in the pictures, modern, clean in perfect state of maintenance. The swimming pool is quite large , I think around 8x3m good enough for a few laps. The staff is wonderful, meeting every request when needed. There's free one way transport within the Seminyak area. Just across the villa there's a small 24h mini market with most of the small stuff, snacks and drinks you may need. Breakfast is served in the villa every morning and there's a choice of western or indonesian dishes.
If there's anything that could be improved it would be the number of items in the room service menu. The menu is good but not very extensive. Since the villas are so comfy and good, I just wish the menu was much more extensive so there will be no need to go out anywhere else to eat.

text:
It was a vacation with me & my partner.

When i first arrived the hotel in the morning as early at 7:30am, the room wasn't ready till 9am hence the hotel crew offered to bring us to the nearest cafe for a breakfast. They introduced "the living stone" which was the only cafe opened as early as 8am. The idea was fantastic and they were flexible to allow us to check in as soon as they finish cleaning up the room. The free shuttle service was a fabulous idea as it could easily save up alot money as they drive us to the tourist attractions.

The room were comfortable, neat, clean and NO MOSQUITOES, in fact they have mosquitoes coils placed. They offered to clean up the room despite we did place a "privacy"tag place outside the villa doors. They punctually pushed in our breakfast every morning and the breakfast was well-cooked, served both westernized and traditional breakfast.. The swimming pool were so clean, that we swam everyday, we have nothing to fault about the rooms.

The hotel crews were friendly and is always smiley regardless which time of the day. The hotel has 2-3 mini van to shuttle their own guest, there were times they were fully taken up but that doesnt stop us from travelling. In fact, the Jineng hired a taxi & prepaid the taxi  for us, we thought that was an extra mile towards us because hotel shuttle service is  not an obligation/not compulsory for all hotel guest. 

They even offered a birthday cake for my partner's birthday & the crews waited as late as 10:30pm for us to came back from our shopping & did a surprised turned up at my place.

We couldnt ask for more, and we were very pleased with our experience with Jineng Villas.
title: Luxury, comfortable, warmth hospitality

text:
We stayed in a one bedroom villa. I had booked anticipating a true tropical paradise type of escape and I wasn't disappointed. The city outside the gates of the villas may be dirty, noisy and sometimes grim, but once you step inside it's so serene and relaxing. In the morning you wake to the sounds of the birds in the bamboo-covered walkway to the villas. 
The pool was awesome, crystal clear and always the perfect temperature. The dining/living room area was a separate wing to the main bedroom part of the villa. There was a shower & toilet area dedicated to the pool area, and another bathroom at the other end of the bedroom section, with a bath. 
We were given a menu to order breakfast for the next day each day. The breakfast was more than enough, and there were a lot of options to choose from. Staff deliver the meal and set it up on the dining table at the time you've specified. 
All staff were very friendly and helpful. The air conditioning was perfect, the room service was cheap, delicious and good quality, and the cleaning of the room was without fault. 
The only issue we found was that the wifi wasn't great - it was patchy, kept dropping out, and was really slow. It was free, though, and we ended up buying data SIM from a phone kiosk near Kuta, which was about $10 for 4GB and really fast.
There's a Circle-K (like a 7-Eleven) across the road from the reception entrance. They sell alcohol, other drinks, snacks etc. 
The hotel has a free transport service for the Seminyak area, and if you're looking for something in particular, chances are good that whomever is at the front desk will know where to find it. Ayu was particularly helpful :)
title: Beautiful refuge in the busy city

text:
We stayed in Jineng Villas for 5 nights. Staff were so lovely and caring. The shuttle (drop off to Seminyak) was great and we used this quite a bit (remember to tip, fellow travellers!). We paid for a one bedroom villa, but upon checking in, we were told we were upgraded to a two bed room villa. We thought great! But they had locked the second bedroom (we didn't need it anyway). We didn't feel comfortable being in villa M. It was the second last villa at the back, so a very long walk especially travelling with a toddler. The bathroom also seemed exposed to outside and we were a bit worried about the mosquitoes. We requested to be changed the next day to a one bedroom villa and we were SO MUCH HAPPIER. Just something about the decor in villa M. Just didn't feel right. We got moved to villa L and understood the kitchen and living area was much bigger than the two bed villa so glad that we asked to be moved. 
Breakfast was not very extensive but tasty (I ate the same breakfast sandwich for 5 days!). 
Internet unfortunately wasn't available everywhere (i.e. the reception area). Only in your villa, and you had to log in each time you wanted to use it. 
We used the pool but it was a bit cold as others have explained due to not getting much sun. 
Location was not fantastic unfortunately. After staying at Courtyard by Marriott, we felt a bit isolated staying at this villa. I did walk back on my own a few times to the villa (fine during the day, but was quite dark at night). 
In summary, this villa would be great if you are after privacy. Although staff were amazing and personal, we preferred staying at a big hotel where there were other kids/families. 
Keep up the good work though Jineng Villas!
title: Lovely staff, lovely villa, but not the best location

text:
My partner and I stayed at The Jineng Villas for 6 nights and all I can say is wow. It really was an amazing villa and lived up to our expectations. 
Although I cant compare it to other villas, since I have only stayed in large hotels in bali, I still would highly recommend it to anyone. 
The staff were very friendly and polite, spoke good english and always willing to help. The drop off service in Seminyak was fantastic! I think we easily saved $50 or more on taxis using this service. Every time we wanted to go and get money changed, go out for dinner or even just to the beach they would be available to drop us there. We stayed in Villa B (2nd from the reception) and we found it very peaceful and relaxing. 
The staff booked restaurants, motorbikes, tours, white water rafting ect for us which was handy. They even got me a personalised chocolate mud cake for my birthday! I cant really fault this villa and if I had to there isn't any major issues.. just that if you are relatively unfit/lazy I would suggest booking a villa down the front of the place because the bamboo path is quite long, also the breakfast is satisfying, fresh and very filling but dont expect a 5 star quality meal, however for something thats included in the price it is well worth it and saved us lots of money. 
Also if you love tanning like myself, I found the way the villas are facing only half of the place gets sun, this is not the villas fault just how it is, this however kept our villa alot cooler and if you want to tan you can just move your white chair into the sun like I did. These things should not deter you from staying here. I am normally one to try new places/things but I would definitely stay at the Jineng Villas again.  
Thanks for having us Jineng Villas - M & M :)
title: Worth it

text:
We stayed at the Jineng Villas for 10 nights in total while holidaying in Bali in July 2015. 
Included pickup and drop off at the airport was great... Staff were well dressed and professional and very helpful as we wanted to do a few things at airport before returning to hotel.  
Hotel staff were all very friendly and helpful where needed throughout the stay.  Drop off in seminyak area was great and we were able to get dropped each time we asked.  
Room service was nice... Food was ok for in room food..was good for nights that we were exhausted and could not be bothered to go out.  
Daily breaky was nice.. We stuck with bacon eggs fruit and French toast.  Powdered milk only.. So we bought our own.  
All facilities were working and functioning.. We used in room safe and had no issues with security.  
Only issue was poor water pressure or maybe blocked shower head on main shower so we just used the second one...wasnt a big issue.  
Spraying daily for mosquito's was fine... Only for a few minutes and remade bed and took any dishes away while they were there.  
Location was fine... Circle k across the road.. Jineng supermarket 5 Min wall.. 2 routes to the seminyak shopping area.  
Staff were able to chase up some tour guides who were running late and make dinner bookings if we requested.  
I rate 5 as I believe services and overall experience was really good and I was really happy overall with our stay.
title: Great value accommodation

text:
We stayed here for 4 nights in the middle of our 10 day stay in bali. 
This is by far the pick of the bunch. We arrived a little early and our room wasn't ready. However the attentive staff allowed us to leave our bags and the free shuttle service dropped us into Seminyak so we could do some sightseeing.
Upon checking in we were greeted with extremely friendly and knowledgeable  staff. The villa itself was beautiful and well maintained.
We mentioned to the staff that the air con in the bedroom wasn't very cold, and when we got back from dinner; they had installed a new unit. 
Breakfast was fantastic every morning. On time and very filling. 
The only negative we encountered was the room service. 
While the food was great. It was not regular. The menu advises that room service is available all day till 10pm. However 2 occasions  (once lunch & once dinner) when we tried to order, we were told that room service wasn't available. 
If that small aspect had of been on point, it would have been 5 stars. 

Hopefully we come back soon and can stay again.
Would definitely recommend.
title: Outstanding facilities & Service

text:
Just left this villa to head home now. Came for 4 nights with my parents, husband and my 3 month old and stayed in a 2 bedroom villa. We thoroughly enjoyed this holiday and highly recommend family and friends to come. Let me detail the pros and cons below.

Pros:
- fully airconed rooms and living room.
- impeccably clean 
- full function kitchen and full sized fridge.
- relatively large private pool 
- warm and welcoming staff who frequently went out of their way to help us. Our room rate included one way shuttle to anywhere in Seminyak. However, on several occasion, the staff were willing to drive my parents to a local eatery to buy take-away back to the villa. They even recommended some tasty locals to take us. On one night, one of their staff actually went and bought dinner for us!! 
- good bug control. None of us got any mossie bite in the villa.
- the in room massages were amazing and soooo reasonably priced!!! 
- tasty breakfast with good selection

Room for improvement:
- the delivery of the breakfast could be more consistent. One day, we did not get the fruit platter and another day they missed the bakery basket. But they quickly delivered it to our room on request. 
- the water pressure of the shower could be improved.
- the sliding doors in the villa makes a loud noise when opening or closing no matter how lightly we slide it. This woke my baby up from sleep many times. 

again, the good points outweighs the bad~ and I would very much return if I visit Bali again~
title: Excellent service, warm and helpful staff

text:
My wife and I visited Jineng for our honeymoon from 12th to the 18th June and our experience was nothing but AWESOME. The check in was super smooth and the villa staff (Ayu) welcomed us with greatest warmth. We were served  welcome drinks at the reception and later  accompanied to the villa for a quick briefing of the facilities inside. We were allocated Villa F and the villa at first sight was paradise. What you see in pictures is what you get.. Just that its much more beautiful. The pool is a beauty and great in size. The pool does create an illusion of being slightly sloped but is actually 5.5 feet end to end. The staff was prompt in getting a nice floating bed for the pool as I did not know how to swim. We were also taken by surprise to see flower decorations in the bedroom and the bathtub for our honeymoon even though we had not taken the honeymoon package. There was also a special honeymoon cake kept on the table nicely decorated with fresh fruits all around. The refrigerator had 6 complimentary soft drinks and the water bottles were replenished every day. The villa is best viewed in the evening with all the lights on. It really did set the tone for a romantic getaway. Cleanliness at The Jineng is top notch.. towels and bed linen are changed every day. The breakfast menu is also quite decent and needs to be finalized on the prior day. Breakfast was always served hot and on time. It tasted great too. We loved the Indonesian specialities like mie goreng and nasi goreng. The egg preparations were simply yummy. Our package also included an hour long balinese couple massage that was very refreshing and done in the villa itself. I was simply wowed over by the hospitality at The Jineng Villas. I had the entire staff in the villa on 16th morning with a beautiful birthday cake singing the birthday song. It was a great birthday surprise planned by my wife and executed well by the staff. The villa also has free shuttle drop service to nearby places of Seminyak. The staff was also quick to arrange for a bike when needed. Overall it was the best experience for me and my wife. Our special thanks to the entire villa staff (Ayu, Andi, Dikka, Angga, Tejaa and others) for the excellent hospitality. They never said NO to anything. We totally recommend The Jineng Villas to anyone and everyone. 
Cons - The breakfast menu could have been a little more elaborate and we were running out of options as we stayed for 6 days.
title: Simply Amazing....

If anyone is questioning or hesitating about staying at the Jineng Villas or looking for a place in Seminyak - DO NOT WASTE ANOTHER MINUTE! It is absolutely beautiful and exceeded all expectations that I had. The Jineng Villas is the place to stay. 

My partner and I stayed for 4 blissful nights after staying 4 nights in Kuta and were so overwhelmingly happy as our previous accommodation was disappointing to say the least. We are certainly glad staying at Jineng was at the end of our trip as it was a perfect way to end our holiday. My partner had never been to Bali before, and out of my 3 previous experiences, I had never personally stayed in Seminyak but after our stay at Jineng, there is no question about staying anywhere else when we return in the future. 

The Villas are pristine clean! They were in immaculate condition, open and spacious and the pool after a long day of shopping was just perfect. The food was so delicious, breakfast served fresh every morning and the staff are so well presented and friendly; attending to any need that you may have had. 

The free shuttle service around Seminyak was another added bonus, particularly as we were quite unfamiliar with the surroundings and felt comfort in being taken to popular tourist spots by a friendly face. 

Thank you Jineng Villas for making our stay more amazing than we could have ever asked for!

text:
Jineng is in the back streets but only a 10 minute walk to Bingtang Super Market. Small Circle K deli across the road that make Pizza’s and have a coffee machine. Villas very quiet, no planes and easy to get to by taxi off Sunset Road. The villas are very nice. Two toilets, showers (with exhaust fans) and wash basins. Large main bedroom, large kitchen lounge area. Both separate A/C and TV’s. Good area to get dressed with ample cupboards, dressing table, writing desk. Large  bathroom with spa, large shower. Good size pool that was clean and in the sun. Kitchen has a full size fridge, sink, cook top ECT. Table and chairs and a comfy lounge. Glass doors  open to the pool area. Small garden. Very well lit at night time. Reception is small and everyone is happy. Languages still a problem with staff. They remember your name and willing to help. Will drive you if their cars are available. Free WiFi works ok, drops out all the time, but seems to be normal in Bali? There isn’t a restaurant but they deliver your breakfast each morning. Very nice and well presented. You can order room service, but will come in a plastic bag and plastic covered containers. 
Marble floor very slippy. The pool is hard to get out of, although there is a ledge, no steps, no hand rail. Day beds near the pool you can’t really use, not comfy. They are in the shade and too hard to move around. Bed was a bit hard. 
Would go back, depending on cost.
title: Great Villas

text: Having stayed at Jineng Villas last year it was an easy decision to return.  Jineng is hidden away on Gang Baik Baik, which is not a lane that travellers would typically walk down so it is not necessarily noticed.  But Jineng is a gem - the villas are well designed and offer privacy, space and comfort in an understated way.  The pool is a reasonable size, although if you have mobility issues, it is not that easy to get out of as there are no steps in the pool.  Breakfast is great - cooked on site, it is served hot and fresh with a good range of options.  Staff are fabulous and very helpful - the shuttle service within Seminyak is an added bonus and makes the short trip to Bintang Supermarket or Jl Laksamana easy.  While there is nothing on offer in Gang Baik Baik, Jl Nakula takes you to Double 6 within 15 minutes of walking.  Last year we discovered Hammerhead Gym which is about a ten minute walk along Jl Nakula in the opposite direction.  Unless you want quick access to the beach, the location of Jineng Villas is not a problem - taxi drivers know the area well. At USD135 a night, Jineng is really good value for money. We plan to stay there again on our next trip to Bali.
title: Hidden Gem

text:
We have just returned from a lovely 12 night stay at Jineng Villas. We have stayed in many hotels in our travels but this one is right up there.
We had  such an amazing time, we looked at the reviews a few weeks before we arrived hoping the positive reviews that we were reading were true. They sure were!
 
The pics on the website are all accurate and it looks even better in real life. We were in Villa K towards the back and could not fault the level of service and genuine warmth of all the staff in which we engaged with. Never was anything too difficult all always done with a big smile. Seeing and engaging with them was a true daily delight, they are a credit to the Hotel.

The villa was always really clean and the pool was just awesome.
We loved the breakfasts in the morning which we always delivered on time although the coffee could be improved a bit, proper machine coffee would be great. The evening touch ups to the villa which included fresh towels for our evening swim and also a comprehensive mosquito spray.This was done whilst we were out for our evening meal. 

The local take away service we used for dinner a few times also really yummy, fairly priced and prompt.The free shuttle service to and from the airport was great as was the free shuttle service within Seminyak which we used daily. We brought our 9 month old son and all the staff were so lovely and warm with him, he was like a celebrity.

The villas are only a 7-8 min walk up the Seminyak Rd and Bintang Supermarket and its a nice walk as you pass other villas and some private homes and gardens.
Also there's a mini mart across the road which was handy to pick up last minute things.
Also its  a short walk to a few quality restaurants especially Malo's for one of the best steaks I have ever eaten. We had a few massages next door also.

Thank you Jineng Villas we hope to visit you again!.
title: Customer Service of the highest Order!
