text:
The is villa is average, was a bit unlucky to land on Nyepi Day, a day of so call silence day in bali, no gas , no tv, no 3G or wifi, no outing at all is allowed n less light ! was damn bored for the day n find it a waste !
villa are clean but kitchenware are limited, no bowl n pans are provided despite there is a hob n hood for cooking, the hotel stuff are kind of retarted as they take your glass , folk n spoon etc away after u use n never replace them!
wifi in the room are relatively slow !
title: So so villa....nothing to shout about !

text:
We stayed at the 2 bedroom villa that come with a small pool for the guests. This villa is well  furnished. 
The living and dining rooms are airconditioned ..which is a relief if you happen to be in Bali during the hot, hot season. 
Just a few mins by taxi is the Seminyak shopping belt whereby you can get good food, shopping and spa.  Rooms are well maintained ..we did complained about the towels..which seems to turn 'grey' after wet. 
Breakfast were good with choice of local and western cuisine.
title: Attentive Staff and New Villa

text:
Me n my husband stay at Jineng for honeymoon by bought the voucher from livingsocial only for IDR 3mio for the package 3D2N. even we use voucher for but the staff not treat us different with other guest their still nice and profesinal.

We really love the villa, the bedroom, bathroom, living room n kitchen was big and clean and they also set up our bed and bathtub with flower arrangement. The private pool i thought same bigger with public pool at the budget hotel.

They have a golf car to bring us and the luggage frm the lobby to our room and they have free shutlle to Seminyak centre and beach club.

The breakfast n dinner are just Ok but not special.

Will come back?SURE
title: Great Experience

text:
After weeks of researching various villas around the deminyak area, i decided to go with the Jineng. It was good value for money and looked to be within a good area. To start off with the villas were clean which was a positive... but I must say up until this hotel I didnt believe in bad customer service. The reception area is a local hangout to be honest, 6 or 7 local boys sitting in there speaking indonesian and talking about you clearly and laughing. This place is not like a fully functional hotel which is up and running. It seemed as if it was partially running, but definitly didnt live up to expectation. The villa itself was nice, although lacked atmosphere. Unless the sun is shining into the pool, which was for max 2 hours per day..it had a really dull feeling to it, and felt like a compound. 
The breakfast was shocking.. not after being a regular traveller to Bali 13 timest to be exact, you come to appreciate a good breakfast in bali. This was so dissapointing considering they sell the villa saying that the chef will come in and personally cook (which is not true)... 1 rasher or bacon, 1 egg, and around 3 peices of pineapple and a fruit juice which is one gulp. Not nearly enough considering I usually find breakfast is my main meal of the day until dinner in the heat. I believe we were the only people saying in the whole hotel, consisting of 17 villas. As we would walk past other villas we could see locals in lying on the beds watching television which was quite the turn off. I would hate to think that the rooms are just open to anyone if they are not being occupied. To be honest Jineng was a major dissapointment and for the cost you could find something much better in Bali. I believe if you want the tranquility of a private villa pay the extra and get a good one - usually affiliated with the big hotels because then they offer all options like larger swimming pools, and good breakfasts,,

Also I was put off by someone elses review about missing money from the safe.. I wouldnt put it past them at this place, it just felt very seedy..
title: Nice place but depressing

text:
Last month i am spending my honeymoon with my wife in Bali, and we manage to stay at jineng for 2 days. The manager is very helpful, and the service is very good too. Though they dunt have a park that we can hang up a round but they have a nice broadwalk. Though they dunt have restaurant, but we can order food and it is served infront of your doorstep. 

One thing i need to highlight is that there are plenty of mosquitoes at night, so please bring mosquito repeller, and make sure your doors and windows are close at night to minimize mosquito bite. Overall we are happy staying in the villa and we will recommend it to our friends.
title: Cozy Villa

text: We stayed here after having to move from another villa following a break in. The staff were lovely, couldn't do enough for you. Breakfast served in your room each morning with reasonable choices. Pool great and very clean. Water every day with turndown service. Only few minor complaints. Sunbeds looked lovely but uncomfortable. No sunbathing areas as all covered in. Need mosquito nets in room. Being very picky here as villas lovely.
title: Excellent villas

text:
- We got the room from an offer at livingsocial. It cost us IDR 2.500.000,- for a two night stay, one bedroom villa, honeymoon room set up, romantic dinner, jet lag massage, airport transfer. We find overall the hotel was good for value.
- At first, at the entrance during checking in, we find it disturbing looking at some staffs in a see through glass staff room were playing bridge games. It was very impolite and inappropriate.
- The room and pool are in a good size, suitable for 2, with living room, spacious bathroom, with extra pool bathroom, kitchen and dining.
- Reading review regarding the complain on the bugs and mosquitoes, we found some mosquitoes, but not a big deal.
- They also provide car / motorcycle service. Motorcycle service at very reasonable price, IDR 50.000,- / day, which is cheaper than others.
- They also provide in room massage service, we got jet lag massage as compliment, it was a very nice 30 mins relaxing massage.
- The breakfast was good, we had two days of american style breakfast. The check out day was early in the morning, we asked for early breakfast, they're supposed to serve breakfast starting 7. But they serve it to us at 6 anyway, which was great and highly appreciated!
title: good villa with good service

text:
I paid $145 a night and it was great value for money. The staff at The Jineng were very good especially the young girl on the front desk.
  We were upgraded to a two bedroom apartment which was nice as it had a massive family style pool.
  The rooms are a good size and the beds are very comfortable
  As for the mosquitos issue in other reviews there were a few but it was not a major issue.
   The breakfast was nice we had both the Nasi and Mee Gorang with nice fresh fruit and juice.
   The location is about a 10 minute walk to the main street and a 4km walk or taxi ride to Kuta.
   Overall a very nice stay at The Jineng.
title: Great pool

text:
I had a great time at the jineng with its accommodation and charming staffs which could fulfil my request. Small private villa which you might need to pay more if you stay at a 5 star boutique resort but here you can have it all. Great accommodation and private swimming pool with a very strategic location in semi yak and easy for us to go out and reach all places that we wants to go. Breakfast was good but might need some variance for long staying guests, great price offered and the reservation staff of premier Nisa is an asset! talentted young lady with her will to help and assist during the reservation. Booking confirmation well recieved with all details and arrangement. She has also try to assist us with every arrangement we need. We such a great time at the jineng and wish to come back again soon..... 

Quite and nice place for accommodation especially in seminal area which sometimes are very crowded everywhere. One thing almost forgot is the beach club, very nice and we could have our sun bathing ......

Also the manager, pak arya if I am not mistaken is very helpful in all they way ..Thanks to all the staff and we will spread out this also to our colleague and friends about jineng..
title: A chic retreat in semi yak

text:
We were only in Bali for the weekend. 

We arrived Thursday night around midnight and left on the following Sunday. 

I had a some of the reveiews below as was a little aprehensive to book here but i always believe some people have too high expectations about Bali accomodation. 

The pool was a great size for a 1 bed villa with a ledge spanning the entire length which is great if you have kids (our daughter was 9 months when we went last weekend). She couldnt stand on her own but could stand when she was in her swim ring. 

The ability to have the lounge room door closed was fantastic for us. Most Bali villas have an open plan lounge room which means it is hot and you have to be extra viligient watching you kids as there is no fence around the pool. We were abke to close the glass doors and let our daughter frawl around the lounge without having to worry about her going near the pool. 

The bedroom was fantastic!! Huge king size bed, massive bathroom with wet area with the shower and toilet, massive spa bath plus here was also a seperate toilet and shower between the bedroom and the lounge area. 

They have a huge fridge but no microwave yet but were happy for us to use the staff microwave to heat up our baby food which we bought up fresh from Perth. 

The breakfast was ok but we only had it 1 day. There are plenty of cafes in Bali to have breakfast and we like to get up in the morning and go out. It wouldnt bother me if they didn't even do breakfast. 

I never keep any money in the safe or cupboards anyway. We usually take some cash and spend the st in our credit card/visa debit cards. Everywhere takes credit cards even DvD shops plus you get the benefit of getting a better rate through the bank. 

The location is off Jalan Nakula if you tell your taxi driver the villas are off this street just past villa seminyak estate and spa and just before villa kubu. 

You could walk to the main jalan legian street with the street coming out just north of bintang supermarket. I loved the fact that the villas were so quiet and we never heard any cars or motobikes (not like our last stay near eat street in seminyak!). 

There is also some taxi's that are about 20 metres from the front of the villa so you dont even need to worry about calling a taxi. 

I thought the villa was clean, staff friendly and accomodating. 

Special thanks to the staff as we left my husbands wallet as the villa and got a phone call when we were just getting to the villa. The security man got on his scooter and brought the wallet to us at the airport. 

I would recommend anyone to stay at the villa and hope to be back next year.
title: Quiet location, clean and great price

text:
The Villa itself is beautiful. Large and clean on arrival and the airport pick up was very handy. The staff were initially very welcoming and let us check in early. Although, from there it was all downhill.

-The breakfast was AWFUL!! We had it on the first day, the bread was stale, the eggs and bacon cold and the fruit bitter. The juice was warm and there was no milk for tea/coffee. 

-Having had such an awful breakfast we informed the reception we no longer wanted their breakfast (TWICE!) and they still called us at 11.30pm and woke us up to inform us we hadnt yet placed our breakfast order for the next morning so I had to tell them AGAIN we didnt want their breakfast. They then rang our doorbell in the morning and woke us up again to deliver a breakfast we had not ordered. 

-On our third day there I went to retrieve our extra cash from the safe only to find nearly half of it had been stolen. I reported this to management who informed me that all staff have access to keys to open the in room safes. They took us to the police station to lodge a police report (this took half the afternoon!) 

-After the stolen money incident I told them no housekeeping or any other staff were to enter the room while we were not there and so we had to have housekeeping pottering around while we were trying to relax and on several occassions house keeping failed to leave us clean towels (as they were at maximum capacity and had run out!), failed to replace our water bottles and failed to properly make the bed or empty the bins. Very disappointing. 

The villas arent very close to anything although taxis are very cheap so that wasnt a massive problem but still a nuisance. Overall, although the villas themselves are gorgeous the overall experience was utterly disappointing.
title: Disappointed

text:
The bottom line: They should call this place the 'Dodgy'-neng!

In more detail:
We stayed there for 6.5 nights in June 2012, before our stay we were very concerned about some negative reviews on Trip Advisor and on Booking.com so we emailed the Villas. They did quickly reply ensuring us that everything in the reviews was not true (but in a follow up email failed to respond when asked what assurances they can provide if they weren’t). We also asked and receive an email confirming our additional half day with late check out (9pm) at half a day’s rate as we had a red eye flight home, all before arriving. 

The positives:

Rooms are as they are in the photos but...
Staff are friendly and mean well but...

So the negatives:

- Confirming other reviews; the water, shower area, bath, and toilet smell like a sewer. Every so often the smell really seems to intensify making you gag and want to vomit. This makes simple daily tasks like showering or brushing your teeth really unenjoyable and really dampens/ruins your holiday experience.

- Confirming other reviews; the location isn’t too great. Luckily we had arranged daily transport (not with the hotel) but without it I think you and any taxi driver would have found it hard to find. E.g. we ordered MacDonald’s delivery one night, the nearest MacD. Is only 3-5 minutes ride away and the local delivery guy took 1 hour to find the place.

- When we arrived the room safe was not functioning so they asked if we would like to move to another villa, which we agreed to

- Moving to the replacement villa we noticed that there where stains on the pillow sheets, questioning the staff member who escorted us to our room, he looked at it and just said laundry have tried clean it but couldn’t and didn’t bother offering to change it. 

- Saying that the villas are new, we had to ask for the keys to the sliding door which controls access to the bedroom (separate from the villa key)

- That night we found a dead bug between the other pillows, called and got new pillow cases 

- There were also some stains on the bed sheets

- There is still construction work happening on the first 3 villas at the front of the property which you have to pass by everyday, needless to say there is noise and stairs from the construction workers every time you walk past
 
- Although the rooms are as they are in the pictures you can tell that an inexperience designer and builder did them. There are lamps that don’t work cause they have no where to plug into which is the same with the kettle (which we had to plug in next to the TV). The place really is form before function.

- The staff although very friendly, mean well and try to help are really not well trained and are inexperienced. E.g. We asked for a bottle opener (as they are not provided) as was told they ran out, next day asked again and was given one. 

- Mosquitoes come with the climate in that part of the world but having stayed in other hotels and Villas in SE Asia before I noticed more than usual, perhaps due to the water issue. Luckily we bought a can of spray and sprayed our room daily, otherwise we would have woken up with bites all over.

- The breakfast; you have to select what you want the night before and the breakfast gets delivered to your room at a time of your choosing which I thought was nice. Additionally we get to choose what juice and fruit you want and if you want an Indonesian breakfast (rice or noodles) or an continental breakfast. The Indonesian breakfast is fair but when I ordered the bacon and eggs all I got was 1 strip of bacon (yes just 1) and one egg. 

- On our second last day despite the prior confirmation of a 9pm checkout, at noon when dropping off my keys so they can clean the Villa staff using the excuse of traffic asked if we could leave earlier…unbelievable! Especially as they knew that my wife is currently pregnant and our flight was a red eye, I simply said we will see and didn’t think much of it. Then that night when picking up my room key they asked if it was possible and I said that I had internet checked in already so 9pm would work, after telling them this… they asked again! This was the very last straw and really pissed me off and frankly has triggered me to write this complete review. 

- On our last day around 4 hours prior to checkout the cable TV (and thus all channels) stopped working. (not sure if this was related to them wanting to get us out early)

In summary, although we were having a fair experience the issues noted above really spoilt our holiday. Even after having secured promotional rates (the main reason we chose The Jineng) I (obviously) wouldn’t recommend you to stay here. There is a myriad of choices and villas competing for your business that I’m sure with research you can find a pool villa miles better than this.
title: They should call this place the 'Dodgy'-neng!

text:
We have just returned from 10 days staying at the Jineng Villas and it was great. It is located between the main roads of Sunset and Seminyak, just 10min walk to the main Seminyak shopping street and with a taxi rank out the front of the hotel - you could get anywhere. The staff could not do enough for us and loved our two young boys. They have a golf cart to deliver baggage, breakfast, etc and they were always taking the kids for a drive and the boys loved it. The breakfasts were good - generous helpings and a good range of food on offer. The also had a book of different delivery options for lunch and dinner from local restaurants if you didn't want to head out.

We stayed in the two bedroom villa and the rooms were modern and very spacious. The pool was clean and caught enough sun to keep the water lovely and warm but allowed you to also swim in the shade if you wanted. If I am to be critical of the design of the 2-bed villa (and we did have an afternoon in a 1-bed villa while we waited for our flight and it didn't have this issue) was the partial open air design of the bathroom. We were lucky during our stay that there was no rain but I can imagine that during hot wet summers the mosquitos would be a serious issue. My suggestion - get yourself down to the Bintang Supermarket for some flyspray.

Overall we have a great time in Seminyak and the staff made us feel very much at home.
title: Lovely quiet villa with fantastic staff

text:
（良点） ヴィラの紹介写真と同じ、非常にコンパクトな作りで機能的なお部屋でした。朝食のナシゴレンが美味しく、ルームサービスも値段も安くとても美味しかったです。プールも大きく南国特有のお花が植えられていて雰囲気も良く静かで良かったです。ホテル専用の車両でお願いすればすぐにどこにでも連れて行ってくれます。帰りはタクシーを捕まえる必要があります。ホテルの前にコンビニがあり便利。その隣のワルンの食事も美味しかったです。蚊の心配をしていましたが夕方蚊取り線香と部屋に殺虫剤を散布するトーンダウンのサービスがあり刺されることはありませんでした。
(追点）プールサイドのリクライニングベッドの場所のスペースが狭い。ジャグジーバスもあまり使われてないのか汚れが気になった。これは仕方がないのですが、隣の部屋に滞在していた方がずーとタバコを吸っていてその煙がこちら側のプール空間にまで流れ臭いし話声も丸聞こえで不快でした。割引もあり安く部屋でSPAサービス受けられたのは良かったのですが、スタッフがSPAの予約を忘れていたり。再度リクエストして予約をお願いしたが、その後予約出来なかった、代わりの日時の提案の連絡をするのを忘れていた等々…不備もあり。
title: おこもり滞在に最適

text:
我在这住了7个晚上，我觉得我还是有发言权的：
先说好的地方吧：
1、泳池、房间都很大，至少比我去之前想的大。
2、地理位置离海边还是比较近的，但是只是“比较近”。
3、早餐、叫餐性价比都很高，很不错。
4、服务态度还是可以的，你有什么需求，只要提出来了，他们都能满足你。
好下面说存在的几个问题吧：
1、周围环境比较差，晚上很黑，有点像村里的感觉，我去之前没有注意这一点，如果你晚上想逛逛那就不是很理想。当然他们提供了摆渡车你出去还是比较方便的，至于回来怎么办，就靠你自己了。
2、干净程度我觉得一般，特别是床单，有点脏。
3、酒店的服务基本上是被动式的，我举个栗子吧，这别墅里蚊子很多，但是你如果不说让他们把院子里的蚊香什么给你弄好，他有时候就想不起来，你说是不是有点被动？另外平时他们也不会理你，除非你找他们，这感觉反正就是比较有隔阂。
4、酒店没大厅，就一个很小的前台，我们最后一天没地方去。

总体评价还是不错，但有几个硬伤估计无法改变。
title: Good but I wont come back again.

text: Disfrutamos de esta villa compuesta de varias villas individuales con máxima privacidad. Tuvimos para nosotros una piscina privada de unos 10 metros por 3m en la que podías bañarte desnudo sin molestar a nadie. Disponíamos de un salón enorme con tele por cable en inglés y cocina a americana con una nevera enorme así como cocina que no utilizamos.  El dormitorio tiene una cama enorme de 2 por 2 metros así como una mesa de trabajo y un enorme baño con jacuzzi y ducha. En la piscina había otro baño con ducha. Todo muy limpio. El personal supereducado. El hotel dispone de un serbios de transporte gratuito al centro o a las playas. Aunque está  andando algo lejos del centro el taxi de vuelta te cueto 30 o 40 IDR. Y los.desyunos eran interminables ya que no podias acabar todo lo qye te traian a la habitacion y cada dia te preguntan con una hoja a rellenar el desayuno del día siguiente. Merece la pena y repetiríamos sin duda
title: Ideal parejas

text:
满意的：上下2层面积很大，绿化很棒，泳池的水较干净且一直有打气，早餐很丰盛是送餐的，每天提供8瓶水。WIFI信号很好有限速，电蚊香+蚊香效果很好，门外的竹林很赞！员工很热情，服务很好，可以提供午餐或晚餐的送餐服务，价格不贵。位置离Bingtang超市不远，走路5-10分钟，Villa门口路对面就有个24小时便利店，也不错！
有点小失望：内部设施较简单陈旧，附近的环境有点差，晚上出行不便！性价比一般！
title: 很棒的Villas

text:
初のプライベートプール付きヴィラに泊まりました。毎日水も循環清掃しているとの事、ゴミも毎日2回の清掃がされているようで、いつでも気持ち良く泳げました。
ベットルーム、リビング、キッチンも心地良く、ゆったり贅沢リラックスできました。
ビーチがすぐ！という場所ではないですが、近くにレストラン、ショッピングエリアがあり、便利です。スタッフも親切でまた泊まりヴィラです。
title: プライベートプール最高

text:
Wir verbrachten hier die ersten 12 Tage unserer Bali-Reise in einer 2-Schlafzimmer Villa und waren wirklich begeistert. Die Villa war sehr schön eingerichtet und sehr sauber. Handtücher und Bettwäsche wurden täglich gewechselt. Zum Einzug gab es eine Schale mit exotischen Früchten und im Kühlschrank standen kostenlose Getränke bereit. Selbst in den Bädern stand jeden Tag eine Flasche Mineralwasser/ pro Person zum Zähneputzen bereit. Überhaupt war an viele nette Details gedacht, die einen Urlaub wirklich angenehm machen. Sogar am Abend kam das Personal noch einmal um Mückenspray (auf Wunsch) zu verteilen.
Das Frühstücksangebot war sehr gut und wurde zur gewünschten Uhrzeit pünktlich in der Villa serviert. Besonders hervorheben möchte ich hier die leckeren frischen Säfte. Aber auch das Abendessen war sehr gut.
Einziger Nachteil war die Lage. Man musste über eine vielbefahrene Straße zum Strand. Das wurde jedoch durch den kostenlosen Shuttleservice, der jederzeit zur Verfügung stand, wieder wettgemacht. Die Fahrer brachten uns zu jedem gewünschten Ziel in der näheren Umgebung. Abschließend muss noch die unglaubliche Freundlichkeit und der excellente Service des Personals erwähnt werden, das den Aufenthalt dort zu einem unvergesslichen Erlebnis macht!
title: Schöne Villen und excellenter Service

text:
Nous avons passé 5 jours à the Jineng villas.
La villa était très propre et nettoyée tous les jours .
A chaque départ  la piscine était aussi nettoyée.
Tous les jours nous devions choisir le petit déjeuner et décider l'heure que nous voulions le lendemain matin, c'était très agréable et nous avions du choix.
Tous les soirs ils venaient passer un coup de bombe dans la villa pour les moustiques et moucherons.
Le personnel était très gentil, nous avions souvent à faire à " ayu " qui était adorable, souriante et toujours à nous demander si tout allait bien, et elle nous a aussi organisé une visite pour la journée .
Nous avions des navettes gratuites pour aller en ville ainsi que l'aller /retour pour l'aéroport .
La villa était calme et très bien pour du repos, et avoir sa piscine privée, est vraiment un plaisir .
Je recommande vivement les villas.
title: Calme et repos

text: Een heerlijke plek om je even terug te trekken uit de drukte, terwijl je toch heel dicht bij strand, winkels en gezellige restaurants zit. Prachtige villa's, goed verzorgd en personeel dat alles voor je wil doen. We kijken terug op een schitterende week in The Jineng. Het is zeker voor herhaling vatbaar.
title: Fantastische villa's
